title: Chintz Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 2 reds and purple applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).
description: Portion of one end of a fabric showing blue heading and exotic flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragment, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 2 reds and purple applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-47.
